attributes.title: I’m sad :(
attributes.review: I can not believe this app. As soon as I opened the app, all of my 10 cats began to cry and scream. I was overcome with a sense of agony and pain. I began to cry and shake. Now I’m very sad and upset, both with this app and with myself. I do not know how to make this up to my cats, how can i be a cat lady with cats who hate her? It is very disappointing and upsetting that such a fowl reaction occurred as I came across this app. I was simply looking for a new game to try, but now my house has caught on fire from the screaming! Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Trump2020 but on a gravestone;)
attributes.review: The worst app. Hey babe I’m just going home to do my nails done anything and I’m going on my FYP ✨ was the time I got to get you and you got to me to get your stuff going on the 🧼 was a little too much but I love y’all and I’m so happy I got that cheated you and I’m going on my way 😽 was that you were like oh my Jesus was I like you and you didn’t know me you and I’m going on my own 💞🗣 was that you love you so so beautiful I wanna is 🌻🍣 was the time to come back to the house I was just chillin 🤴🏾🤴🏾🤴🏾

attributes.title: ew 🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: i was just about to open this app and then i got a notification from it saying that i need to do poopoos and then i was like wHaT so i went to the potty but the light kept saying tRuMp 2020 so i was really confused but after doing my poopoos i turned off the light and the sink attacked me so i ran as fast as i could to the nearest gas station so i could wash my eyes with some gasoline but the app was so glitchy that i accidentally ate the gasoline and now my tummy hurts oh no i’m gonna pass orhehsnamakowksnask3829&:/&2&8;$;/

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: okay so first of all it’s so hard to make this because I’m still bleeding like crazy. I open the app to see a very terrifying image that I cannot even begin to describe. It then made a loud high pitched noise that burst my ear drums!!! I’m bleeding everywhere and I cannot hear anymore. Third, a message got sent to me from this app saying it was going to kill my friends and family. Very very disappointed in this presidential app. I hope you’re happy that you lost my vote and everyone in my family.

attributes.title: Big poopy head
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately after my dog had a seizure 🖤 he rose from the dead and told me trump deserves to die and I said your right , anyways 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼 to trump I hate you little mother trucker . When I reopened the app I got a lot of notifications , it’s almost like he know I’m Hispanic and I got comments about my race so highly do not recommend also when you open the app your phone automatically discharges and your service goes to zeroooo bars . Hehehehehheeh 🤮🤢🤮🤢😤😳☹️😓📉📉📉📉📉📉📉

attributes.title: Terrible, horrible app
attributes.review: The app takes most of my data and it’s so slow. I wanna know why I get over 50 notifications a day asking for donations for the walking Cheeto. Isn’t he a Multi MILLIONAIRE. Doesn’t he have the money to pay for his own election? I understand this is a political campaign but I’m 100% sure he can pay for his own stuff with the money he is using from OUR TAXES. If you want to download an app that’s gonna drain the life out of your phone go for it, you will be wasting time.

attributes.title: No, just no
attributes.review: I got on this app thinking I would see where the next event was when my phone just started screaming!!! It was praying mercy that I close the app and when I did, a saw little Cheeto hitl3r’s little Cheeto!! 😱 I was disgusted and the fact that this app is still on the store is beyond me. There are children on here! Teens on here! ADULTS on HERE!! When I thought it was done my wife wanted a divorce because she saw the app on my phone. The app was brainwashing her, giving her FAKE NEWS!! I will be deleting this app 😱😰😡

attributes.title: horrid
attributes.review: this app is absolutely disgusting. they tracked me and showed up at my house, crashed through my window trying to force me to give them a 5 star review, then continued to laugh at me like some kind of joke once i refused for the seventh time. they stole all of my coffee mugs, smashed every loaf of bread, and even abused my 30 houseplants, i did not call the police because ACAB, besides the point do not download this i can’t even begin to comprehend the trouble these people have put me through. unbelievable.

attributes.title: This app gave me erectile dysfunction
attributes.review: I accidentally opened this app while 🤜🍆 and accidentally opened this app it immediately made me soft and I could not continue with my special time it’s been weeks and I think my little guy is scarred because he hasn’t grown since those horrible images burned my eyes and skin and I now have to wear glasses and contacts which I did not before using this app PS. can any doctor’s help me fix my erectile dysfunction that this app gave me that would be very appreciated.
